mapper.insert: insert into reservation (id, quantity, price, res_date, price_total, act_id, user_id) values (#{id}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{res_date}, #{price_total}, #{act_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update reservation set iscanceled=1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.res_date, r.act_id, a.act_name from reservation r join activity a on(r.act_id = a.id) where user_id = #{user_id} and iscanceled=0 order by r.res_date asc
